title: JavaScript Object to JSON
description: Convert JavaScript objects to valid JSON with circular reference detection, function handling, and BigInt support
placeholder:
Paste your JavaScript object here...

Example:
{
  name: 'John',
  age: 30,
  isActive: true,
  tags: ['developer', 'javascript']
}

instructions.title: How to use JavaScript Object to JSON Converter

steps.title: Paste your JavaScript object
steps.description: Enter your JavaScript object literal in the input area. The tool accepts objects with unquoted keys, single quotes, trailing commas, and other JS-specific syntax.

steps.title: Configure conversion options
steps.description: Choose how to handle special values like functions, undefined, BigInt, circular references, and select your preferred indentation style.

steps.title: Convert to JSON
steps.description: Click the Convert button to transform your JavaScript object into valid, standards-compliant JSON format.

steps.title: Copy or download result
steps.description: Copy the valid JSON to your clipboard for immediate use or download it as a .json file for storage and sharing.

features: Handles unquoted keys and single-quoted strings
BigInt conversion to string or number
Validation warnings for non-JSON compatible values
100% client-side processing - your data never leaves your browser
useCases: Convert JavaScript config objects to JSON format
Prepare API request payloads from JS objects
Transform console.log output to valid JSON
Convert browser DevTools copied objects to JSON
Generate JSON fixtures from JS test data
Convert Node.js module exports to JSON configs
proTips: Use the 'Show warnings' option to see what values couldn't be converted
BigInt values can be converted to strings to preserve precision
Functions are removed by default but can be converted to '[Function]' strings
Circular references are detected and reported with their path
Copy objects directly from browser DevTools and paste here
Use compact mode for minified output suitable for APIs
troubleshooting: Syntax error: Check for missing commas, brackets, or invalid characters
Circular reference: The object references itself - review the reported path
BigInt error: Enable BigInt to string conversion in options
Function in object: Enable function handling or remove functions manually
Undefined values: Choose whether to keep as null or remove entirely

meta.title: JavaScript Object to JSON Converter - Free Online Tool | OctoTools
meta.description: Convert JavaScript objects to valid JSON online. Handle circular references, BigInt, functions, and undefined values. Free, secure, browser-based converter with no data uploads.

messages.converted: JavaScript object converted to JSON successfully

tagline: Convert JavaScript objects to valid JSON instantly with smart handling
pageDescription: Transform JavaScript object literals into valid JSON format with our free online converter. Automatically handles unquoted keys, single quotes, trailing commas, circular references, BigInt values, and functions. Perfect for developers converting console output, config files, or test data to JSON. Secure client-side processing with no data uploads.
